cz.ive.location
Class JamImpl

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.location.JamImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Jam, MoveAware, Updateable, java.io.Serializable
public class JamImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Jam, java.io.Serializable

Class storing informations about movement of objects, to delay evaluation of reactions on this movement. It should also join movement messages as mentioned in the specification. So remove and add messages should be combined into one move message and so on.

Author:
ondra
See Also:

                       WayPoint src,

Method to be called when some object was or is to be moved from one location to the other.

Specified by:
moveObject in interface MoveAware
Parameters:
object - IveObject that is moving
src - source WayPoint of the movement. This parameter has to have a valid Id but does not necessarily have to be a valid WayPoint.
dest - destination WayPoint of the movement. This parameter has to have a valid Id but does not necessarily have to be a valid WayPoint.
